mapper.insert: insert into `imgs` (uid, title, intro, nums) values (#{uid}, #{title}, #{intro}, #{nums})
insert into `imgs_path` (img_id, path, height, ind) values (#{imgId}, #{netPath}, #{height}, #{ind})
mapper.select: select res1.*, res2.path, res2.height, res2.ind from ( select u.uid, u.name, u.avatar, i.id, i.title, i.likes, i.collects, i.maintag, i.tags from user u join imgs i on u.uid = i.uid ) res1 join imgs_path res2 on res1.id = res2.img_id where res2.ind = 0
select info.*, path.path, path.height from imgs info left join imgs_path path on info.id = path.img_id where info.id = #{imgid}
select count(*) from imgs_like where img_id = #{imgid} and uid = #{uid}

select b.*, res.path from imgs_board b left join (select f.*, p.path from imgs_followimg f left join imgs_path p on f.img_id = p.img_id where f.board_id) res on b.id = res.board_id where b.uid = #{uid}
